name: Sticta
Relationship: Compare: DATURA ARBOREA - BOUGMANCIA CANDIDA (cannot concentrate thoughts; brain floats in thousands of problems and grand ideas. Floating sensation as if ideas were floating outside of brain. Headache, heartburn. Burning sensation around cardiac end of stomach, extending to oesophagus with sense of constriction. Heat and fullness over liver region.) CERTRARIA - Iceland Moss (chronic diarrhoea, phthisis, bloody expectoration. Is used as a decoction and boiled with milk as an expectorant and nutrient in bronchorrhea, catarrh, etc.) Also compare: ERYNG.; DROS.; STILLING.; RUMEX; SAMBUCUS.

Head: Catarrhal headache before discharge appears
Burning in eyes and soreness of balls
Burning in eyelids
Sensation as if scalp were too small
Dull headache, with dull heavy pressure in forehead and root of nose
Respiratory: Worse towards evening and when tired
Pain through chest from sternum to spinal column
Throat raw; dropping of mucus posteriorly
Dry, hacking cough during night; worse, inspiration
Pulsation from right side of sternum down to abdomen
Mind: Feels as if floating in air
Confusion of ideas; patient must talk
Abdomen: Urine increased, with soreness and aching in bladder
Diarrhoea; stools profuse, frothy; worse, morning
Nose: Constant need to blow the nose, but no discharge
Dry scabs, especially in evening and night
Feeling of fullness at the root f the nose
Extremities: Chorea-like spasms; legs feel floating in air
Joints and neighboring muscles red, swollen, painful
Spot of inflammation and redness over affected joint
Rheumatic pain in right shoulder joint, deltoid, and biceps

details: Offers a set of symptoms like coryza, bronchial catarrh and influenza, together with nervous and RHEUMATIC disturbances. There is a general feeling of dullness and malaise, as when a cold is coming on; dull, heavy pressure in forehead, catarrhal conjunctivitis, etc. RHEUMATIC STIFFNESS OF NECK.
